rows.label: qst202716_msg0001
rows.name: [ML:Dash ]Hey, what happened to the ritual, mo?

rows.label: qst202716_msg0002
rows.name: It's been called off.

rows.label: qst202716_msg0003
rows.name:
In the first place, there's
no way you can change Alst
with something like this.

rows.label: qst202716_msg0004
rows.name:
You were all just about to
throw your lives away.

rows.label: qst202716_msg0005
rows.name: You are...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202716_msg0006
rows.name: Your mother asked me to come find you.

rows.label: qst202716_msg0007
rows.name:
You need to seriously reflect on how
much you've worried your parents and
troubled so many people with this...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202716_msg0008
rows.name:
Mimumu and the others...
with the power of the
Nopon, we can save Alst...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202716_msg0009
rows.name:
We were told we could change
Alst, and we thought we
could do anything, mo.

rows.label: qst202716_msg0010
rows.name:
But... that was a mistake,
mo...[ML:Dash ] I'm sorry.

rows.label: qst202716_msg0011
rows.name: You're apologizing to the wrong person.

rows.label: qst202716_msg0012
rows.name:
You should be apologizing to your
mother, not me. She's been worried
about you this whole time.

rows.label: qst202716_msg0013
rows.name: My mother...?[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202716_msg0014
rows.name:
Listen. I'm not saying you can't
rebel against people or the world.

rows.label: qst202716_msg0015
rows.name:
But if you're going to, you have
to be prepared to bear the
responsibility and consequences.

rows.label: qst202716_msg0016
rows.name:
If you can't do that, then it's just
the selfish tantrum of a brat.

rows.label: qst202716_msg0017
rows.name: Understand?

rows.label: qst202716_msg0018
rows.name: Yes, mo...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202716_msg0019
rows.name:
If you understand, then
we're going home right
now. We'll take you there.

rows.label: qst202716_msg0020
rows.name:
Well, if it's all right, then hurry
up and let's mosey on home. We'll
make sure you get there okay.
